title:
Laplacian and codifferential operators on p-forms in (Anti)-de Sitter
  spaces: restriction and continuation
authors: E. Huguet, J. Queva, J. Renaud
abstract:
We derive explicit restriction and continuation formulas between
n-dimensional (Anti)-de Sitter spaces and the (n + 1)-dimensional Minkowskian
ambient space for the codifferential and Laplace-de Rham operators acting on
p-forms.
